overview: A seasoned professional with 15 years of experience in Technology, Digital Marketing & Media sectors. His experience in online advertising, search and ad serving technology sales and business development, digital marketing and ad serving technology, serve him well in his business development position at Shiny Ads. His previous roles include Canoe/Sun Media as Director of Product Management & Strategic Alliances and Director of Technology Sales at 24/7 Real Media.

relationships.title: Vice President of Business Development and Sales
